title: Cooking apparatus

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for cooking apparatus, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front elevational view of the cooking apparatus of the present invention
FIG. 2 is a right side elevational view of thereof;
FIG. 3 is a left side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a rear elevational view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a top plan view of thereof
FIG. 6 is a bottom plan view of the thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a front elevational view thereof with an access door being shown in an open position.
